# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and functionality, it's valued at $120. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $110 for you. This exclusive offer won't last long, so I hope you'll find this deal attractive and decide to make a purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
